item.title: Information Technology for Life Science
item.description: Slides View lectures slide in your browser (html) Action Items Note that Assignment 1 is made available today. Please make sure you have sent us your gmail account at email Points of reflection Your devices contain an incredible amount of personal information. The consequences from misuse by malicious individuals for some of this information are quite easy to see (eg credit card numbers). How else can data be stolen from your machine and used in a malcious fashion?
